mapper.sql: a.inven_model AS "invenModel", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.data_source AS "dataSource", a.goods_brand_id AS "goodsBrandId", a.goods_brand_name AS "goodsBrandName", a.goods_gender_id AS "goodsGenderId", a.goods_gender_name AS "goodsGenderName", a.goods_season_id AS "goodsSeasonId", a.goods_season_name AS "goodsSeasonName", a.goods_type_id AS "goodsTypeId", a.goods_type_name AS "goodsTypeName", a.import_time AS "importTime", a.import_user_id AS "importUserId", a.inven_brand AS "invenBrand", a.inven_desc AS "invenDesc", a.inven_gender AS "invenGender", a.inven_length AS "invenLength", a.inven_major_types AS "invenMajorTypes", a.inven_medium_types AS "invenMediumTypes", a.inven_month AS "invenMonth", a.inven_price AS "invenPrice", a.inven_season AS "invenSeason", a.is_perfect AS "isPerfect", a.series AS "series", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.update_user_id AS "updateUserId", a.yunju_product_id AS "yunjuProductId", a.ori_model AS "oriModel", a.goods_weight AS "goodsWeight", a.category_name AS "categoryName", a.category_id AS "categoryId"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_goods_nbr_standard( inven_model, goods_id, data_source, goods_brand_id, goods_brand_name, goods_gender_id, goods_gender_name, goods_season_id, goods_season_name, goods_type_id, goods_type_name, import_time, import_user_id, inven_brand, inven_desc, inven_gender, inven_length, inven_major_types, inven_medium_types, inven_month, inven_price, inven_season, is_perfect, series, update_time, update_user_id, yunju_product_id, ori_model, goods_weight, category_name, category_id ) VALUES ( #{invenModel}, #{goodsId}, #{dataSource}, #{goodsBrandId}, #{goodsBrandName}, #{goodsGenderId}, #{goodsGenderName}, #{goodsSeasonId}, #{goodsSeasonName}, #{goodsTypeId}, #{goodsTypeName}, #{importTime}, #{importUserId}, #{invenBrand}, #{invenDesc}, #{invenGender}, #{invenLength}, #{invenMajorTypes}, #{invenMediumTypes}, #{invenMonth}, #{invenPrice}, #{invenSeason}, #{isPerfect}, #{series}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUserId}, #{yunjuProductId}, #{oriModel}, #{goodsWeight}, #{categoryName}, #{categoryId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fx_goods_nbr_standard SET inven_model = #{invenModel}, goods_id = #{goodsId}, data_source = #{dataSource}, goods_brand_id = #{goodsBrandId}, goods_brand_name = #{goodsBrandName}, goods_gender_id = #{goodsGenderId}, goods_gender_name = #{goodsGenderName}, goods_season_id = #{goodsSeasonId}, goods_season_name = #{goodsSeasonName}, goods_type_id = #{goodsTypeId}, goods_type_name = #{goodsTypeName}, import_time = #{importTime}, import_user_id = #{importUserId}, inven_brand = #{invenBrand}, inven_desc = #{invenDesc}, inven_gender = #{invenGender}, inven_length = #{invenLength}, inven_major_types = #{invenMajorTypes}, inven_medium_types = #{invenMediumTypes}, inven_month = #{invenMonth}, inven_price = #{invenPrice}, inven_season = #{invenSeason}, is_perfect = #{isPerfect}, series = #{series}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId}, yunju_product_id = #{yunjuProductId}, ori_model = #{oriModel}, goods_weight = #{goodsWeight}, category_name = #{categoryName}, category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE id = #{id}
